column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: CUSTOMER_ID
column.comment: BAN Number

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: CUSTOMER_TELNO
column.comment: For an individual customer this field contains the Customer's Home telephone number.  For a business customer this field contains the telephone number of the contact person (for billing purposes).

column.name: CUSTOMER_FAX
column.comment: For an Individual - This field contains the FAX telephone number of the customer.  For a Business - This field contains the FAX number of the contact person (for billing purposes).

column.name: WORK_TELNO
column.comment: The customer's work telephone number (for information purposes).

column.name: WORK_FAX
column.comment: The customer's work FAX number (for information purposes).

column.name: DEALER_CODE
column.comment: Code of Dealer

column.name: SALES_AGENT
column.comment: The sales agent involved in the sale to the customer (second dealer).

column.name: MARKET_ID
column.comment: A valid market code validated against the Market table.

column.name: VERIFIED_DATE
column.comment: The field holds the date on which the customer details (name, address, etc.) are verified with the customer.

column.name: CONV_CUST_ID
column.comment: The related customer ID from the SellPlan converted system.

column.name: BUSINESS_ENTITY
column.comment: This attribute defines the business entity from which the Customer receives the bill, i.e., AS, IS. Refers to the reference tabele BUSINSS_ENTITY, where it is the unique identifier for an entry. Valid values are the codes for the serviceprovider or MMO.

column.name: LOCATION
column.comment: Location of the ACD system. Currently possible versions: "N" = ACD North "NO" = ACD Stahnsdorf "W" = ACD Ratingen "SW" = ACD Stuttgart

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: DOCUMENT_TYPE
column.comment: The document type code that the customer may use in order to identify himself.

column.name: SECONDARY_DOC_TP
column.comment: Identifies the secondary document, which is used by the customer to identify himself. Values can be B - Bank Card, E - EC Card, C - Credit Card

column.name: DEFAULT_PRODUCT_TYPE
column.comment: The default LOCS of the customer.

column.name: COMP_REG_CITY
column.comment: Commercial Register City

column.name: COMP_REG_PREFIX
column.comment: commercial register Prefix

column.name: COMP_REG_NO
column.comment: commercial register Number

column.name: GENDER
column.comment: The gender of the customer (used for risk check). M - Male or F - Female

column.name: ADVERTISING_IND
column.comment: Indicator that indicates whether the customer information can be passed on to other companies for advertising purposes.

column.name: PERSON_DATA_EVAL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether to analyse the subscribers' personal data for statistics and management purposes. Default for all subscribers, can be overridden at subscriber level.

column.name: MAGAZINE_COUNT
column.comment: Indicates the number of magazines the customer receives.

column.name: INTERNET_SERVI_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether this subscriber is an Internet user.

column.name: PERSONAL_ID
column.comment: the encrypted passport ID or personal ID number for Call-Ya postcard information

column.name: CONV_WITHOUT_LINK
column.comment: Indicates whether this BAN was converted without automatic link that is performed.

column.name: QUELLE_ADVERT_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the Quelle customer wants to receive marketing brochures and other mailing information.

column.name: DWH_CUSTOMER_TP
column.comment: Business customer code; e.g. CA - Corporate Account, ME - Medium Enterprises, SE - Small Enterprises, SO - Small Office / Home Office, PC - Private Customer

column.name: DWH_INDUSTRY_CD
column.comment: Industry codes based on the WZ93 standard.

column.name: DWH_INDUSTRY_DESC
column.comment: Industry code descriptions based on the WZ93 standard.

column.name: CARING_VO_ID
column.comment: The VO_ID of the serving dealer for GKO account. - Customer value per BAN calculated from the usage of its subscriber_no.

column.name: CUSTOMER_VALUE
column.comment: Customer Value

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
